The '''Book of Conjurations''' is an aptly-named spellbook focused on [[Conjuration]]s.

== Spells ==
{{spellbook|Book of Conjurations}}

== Further Reading ==
The [[Book of Power]] contains a variety of more powerful Conjurations. Also, skilled Conjurers may wish to seek out the [[Book of Annihilations]], which contains the most powerful Conjurations available.

== History ==
*In [[0.27]], [[Dazzling Flash]] and [[Iskenderun's Mystic Blast]] were removed, and [[Conjurer]]s no longer start with this book.
*In [[0.25]], [[Dazzling Spray]] was replaced with [[Dazzling Flash]] and [[Force Lance]] was removed.
*In [[0.20]], [[Iskenderun's Battlesphere]] was replaced with [[Force Lance]].
*In [[0.13]] [[Force Lance]] was replaced with [[Searing Ray]].
*Prior to [[0.12]], this book contained spells focused on Air and Ice magic.
*Prior to [[0.9]], there were two possible starting books for Conjurers: one that focused on Air and Ice Magic and another that focused on Fire and Earth Magic.
